titles.title: Directing the Secretary of the Senate to make a correction in the enrollment of the bill S. 1605.
Directing the Secretary of the Senate to make a correction in the enrollment of the bill S. 1605.

action.text: Mr. Smith (WA) asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: This concurrent resolution directs the Secretary of the Senate to make a correction in the enrollment of S. 1605 (National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2022) to amend the long title of the bill.
